Articles.Content:
ASAAAA builder offer his experience to help realize your spacecrafts.

-SSTOs

-Rockets

-Satellites

-Rovers

Post a request in here if you need or if you want an exquisite piece inside your hangar.

- the form must contain the aim of the craft and the part limit.

- No sci-fi reproduction will be done.

- the craft will be purely STOCK but can be designed to be upgraded with mods.

- absurd requests will be accepted on compromise

Thanks.
Can you make me an SSTO Rocket Shuttle for my space station in LKO?

Can you make me an SSTO Rocket Shuttle for my space station in LKO?

I need more infos man, like how many kerbals you want in it, how many parts? What is the main aim of it... Make a better request as accurate as you can and ill bring it to your hangar

And as rocket shuttle you mean no jets?

Edited June 26, 2013 by Rosarium
Like jets and switch over to rocket, can it be launched from the VAB, be drone controlled and carry 4 kerbals, in a hitchhiker. RCS and docking. Cheers!

Like jets and switch over to rocket, can it be launched from the VAB, be drone controlled and carry 4 kerbals, in a hitchhiker. RCS and docking. Cheers!

Tiny and compact i think i'll be able to realize it under 50 parts so you'll be able to have more of them docked without burning your CPU.

Tiny and compact i think i'll be able to realize it under 50 parts so you'll be able to have more of them docked without burning your CPU.

That'd be great, thanks
This thread should be in rocket builder.

That'd be great, thanks

Here:

all requests has been successfully implemented. Sorry for the time delay, i've been able to work on it only few hours ago. Due to the re-entry feature i've been forced to rise the part number up to 74.( 4 ladders, 3 chutes ). if you are still up on it just post here and i'm going to PM it with a detailed launch program.
